3. Load configÂ¶

You can load configuration from file:

from configrw import Config

config = Config().from_file('./path/to/file')

or load config from string:

config = Config().from_str("""
[section1]
option1 = 100
option2 = 200

[section2]
option1 = 300
""")

or create new empty config:

config = Config()
